name: Friendship Bobby & College Party
description:
Take on the role of a handsome college student aspiring to become the most popular guy in his school, explore around the campus to meet different people, and try to make friends without running into problems. What problems? Well, there's much for you to discover. Will the friendship with Bobby survive through his college party? Let the tale of resistance against temptation begins!

Made by Team 8 © 2020

Lingjie "Jason" Zheng, Nathan Pagan, Zhuyi "Victor" Liu, Brendan Schwartz, Zhenning Guo

Self-published by Zhuyi "Victor" Liu
